ed0c9707-b2d1-492c-83d2-88ea98087b1a.name: Impulsiveness
ed0c9707-b2d1-492c-83d2-88ea98087b1a.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

37ade9e6-2e7f-41a4-9ac1-960808a97381.name: Trickster
37ade9e6-2e7f-41a4-9ac1-960808a97381.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!
